summary: Background Bats are natural reservoirs for several highly pathogenic and novel viruses including coronaviruses (mainly Alphacoronavirus and Betacoronavirus) knowledge about age-specific pattern of CoV infection in P. lylei, prevalence, and viral shedding may have an impact on infection-age-structure model to control CoV outbreak. fected bats significantly lower than uninfected bats. no gender difference related to infection was found at the sites.
